page.title: 07Scrap Yard - Slaithwaite
page.content:
The{scrap yard}is on the road to Slaithwaite,it is owned by the {Schofield}brothers. Before the scrap yard was made it used to be a farm haulage contractors. The scrap yard is rather unsightly but it can only be seen from across the valley.We were shown different kinds of metal copper,iron,aluminium ,steel,and lead .
We saw a variety of scrap, there was an old steam roller ,some engines from things like tractors and electric motors. We were shown some old printing type and plates.The metal goes to places like Case tractors and then can get sent back again as scrap. Other scrap is sent as far afield as {Spain}and{Japan}.In winter when business is slack,Schofields contract out their{snow ploughs}to the council.
